sentences.en: All the tyrannies of the past were half - hearted and inefficient.
sentences.cn: 以前的所有暴政都不能彻底,都是软弱无能.

sentences.en: Eastern Europe shows that worker-owned factories can be as inefficient as state-owned ones.
sentences.cn: 东欧的经验表明，工人所有的工厂可能和国有工厂一样效率低下。

sentences.en: He's hopelessly inefficient , but I suppose he means well.
sentences.cn: 他低能得无以复加, 然而却是出于好心.

sentences.en: Inefficient personnel were cleaned out of the management.
sentences.cn: 管理人员中办事效率不高的被清除了出去.

sentences.en: Managers have at last got it into their heads that they can no longer accept inefficient operations.
sentences.cn: 管理者们终于意识到自己不能再安于低效率的运营了。

sentences.en: Many lenders believe that small farmers are inefficient and lack management skills.
sentences.cn: 许多出借者认为小农场主是效率低的和缺乏管理技能的.

sentences.en: Non-state firms gradually elbow aside the inefficient state-owned ones.
sentences.cn: 非国有企业逐渐挤掉了效率低下的国有企业。

sentences.en: Overall, barter is a very inefficient means of organizing transactions.
sentences.cn: 总之，易货贸易是一种效率很低的交易形式。

sentences.en: That's an inefficient and expensive method.
The inefficient operation cost the firm a lot of money.
sentences.cn: 低效率的运作使该公司损失了许多钱.

sentences.en: The manager cleaned out inefficient personnel.
sentences.cn: 经理把效率低的员工精简掉了.

sentences.en: The train company is overstaffed and notoriously inefficient.
sentences.cn: 铁路公司冗员过多，工作效率出了名地低。

sentences.en: The whole process is wasteful and inefficient.
sentences.cn: 整个程序既浪费又效率低。

sentences.en: Their communication systems are inefficient in the extreme.
sentences.cn: 他们的通讯系统效率非常差。

trans.tran_cn: 无效率的，无能的，不称职的，徒劳的
trans.tran_en: not using time, money, energy etc in the best way
